locations.title: The Inn
locations.description:
Existing 52 room inn with plans to expand an additional 36 branded bungalows on a 5 acre oceanfront parcel directly adjacent to the inn.

The Inn sits on eight acres of sprawling oceanfront lawn and croquet fields commanding one of the most spectacular views youâ€™re ever going to find.

locations.title: Oceanside Village
locations.description: 156 Single family oceanfront lots situated over 23 Acres.

locations.title: Vacation Club Cottages
locations.description:
12 Oceanfront cottages

Melrose features a charming collection of cottages nestled between the oceanfront and the Nicklaus Signature Golf Course.

Designed in true Southern charm, these accommodations will offer luxurious residential touches such as vaulted ceilings, fireplaces, opulent bathrooms and verandas with stunning views.

locations.title: Beach Club Villas
locations.description:
56 Units. 6 Acres.

After an extensive renovation in 2014, the property features a wellness facility, two large oceanfront swimming pools, a kids pool, soaking tub, as well an Oceanside bar and restaurant.

locations.title: The Enclave
locations.description: 58 Plantation Lots. Parcel Size is 58 Acres.
